column1: Local Foods////Their pretzel bun is amazing.  While only a couple of their sandwiches come with the pretzel bun on the menu
column2: that doesn't stop me from asking for it on any sandwich I order.  My favorite thing to order there is the Gulf Shrimp and Blue Crab sandwich... on
column4: a pretzel bun.  I'm talking about big chunks of crab meat and good sized shrimp!  Their Truffled Egg Salad is also amazing.  Their sides are okay... but I do have to say
